analysis.key_quote: I am strongly opposed to this rule (OPM-2025-0004-0001).  We did away with the spoils system in 1883 with the Pendleton Act to end rampant corruption.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the rule and references historical context regarding the spoils system and corruption, indicating a concern for maintaining a merit-based system and preventing politicization of civil service.
